Package eu.opends.hmi

Class TrafficLightPresentationModel

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel
eu.opends.hmi.TrafficLightPresentationModel
public class TrafficLightPresentationModel
extends PresentationModel
This class represents the presentation of a traffic light phase assistant. The distance between the moving car and a traffic light is measured in order to update the recommended speed information in the presentation. When red, the time of the remaining red will be computed from the traffic light data.
Author:
Rafael Math

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TrafficLightPresentationModel​(Simulator sim, Car car, TrafficLight triggeredTrafficLight)
    Initializes a traffic light phase assistant presentation model by setting the positions of the car and the traffic light, the minimum distance from the traffic light to cancel the presentation and the triggered traffic light.

  • Constructor Details

    • TrafficLightPresentationModel

      public TrafficLightPresentationModel​(Simulator sim, Car car, TrafficLight triggeredTrafficLight)
      Initializes a traffic light phase assistant presentation model by setting the positions of the car and the traffic light, the minimum distance from the traffic light to cancel the presentation and the triggered traffic light.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator
      car - Car heading toward traffic light
      triggeredTrafficLight - Traffic light whose trigger was hit

    • createPresentation

      public long createPresentation()
      Creates a traffic light phase assistant presentation task on the HMI GUI. This data will only be sent to the HMI bundle once.
      Specified by:
      createPresentation in class PresentationModel
      Returns:
      Presentation ID. If an error occurred, a negative value will be returned.

    • updatePresentation

      public void updatePresentation​(long presentationID)
      Updates a traffic light phase assistant presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the traffic light has changed or if the traffic light info of any traffic light has changed.
      Specified by:
      updatePresentation in class PresentationModel
      Parameters:
      presentationID - ID of presentation task to update.
